title: Altimeter Wear
summary: Altimeter Wear is an app that lets you know your current Altitude in realtime!
description: Altimeter Wear is a simple app that lets you know your current Altitude in realtime, also in your Android Wear device.NOTE: Barometer needed in at least one of your devices to work properly.- Suggestions or reports: alessandromautone@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Altimeter Wear is a simple app that lets you know your current Altitude in realtime, also in your Android Wear device.

NOTE: Barometer needed in at least one of your devices to work properly.

- Suggestions or reports: alessandromautone@gmail.com
comments: Altimeter starts from 425 m, no matter I'm standing in the water on the beach. When climbed to the 12th floor, it shows just 10 m higher. Calibration? How should I guess the correct value, if I'm looking for altitude using this program?
The altitude measurement is not accurate. The altitude measurement is not accurate and the calibration is unable to accept negative value.
